item.description: We're doing it again - after much anticipation, we'll get our butts back over to Donohue's for a night of drinking, debauchery, and singing. This place is great - low-key, decent beers, and best of all, close by for all. Hope to see you there :)
item.how_to_find_us: You know my mug by now :) If not you can call my cell.
item.name: Karaoke at Donohue's!
